"Ferocious Ruins Probe":
"<%me>, I found you!
You haven't painstakingly explored the Ruins,
have you? Did you think I wouldn't know!?
That kind of rumor always reaches my ears first!
You do this even though I'm constantly checking
to make sure that you haven't regressed to an
untrained hack! If you don't clear this quest on
S Rank right now, there is going to be hell to pay!
*Clear on Hard or higher with an S Rank
within 50 minutes"

"<%me>、見っけ！
アンタ、まめに遺跡を探索してないでしょ？
私が知らないとでも思ってるの！？
そういうウワサはすぐに届くんだから！
アンタがへっぽこぴーに逆戻りしてないか
チェックしに来てあげてるのに。
今すぐＳランククリアしてみせないと
ひどい目に遭わせちゃうんだから！

※ハード以上、50分以内Sランククリア"
